alert.note: Alert for St. Charles (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 12:54PM CDT until May 13 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. Charles County in east central Missouri... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Josephville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... O`Fallon, St. Charles, St. Peters, Chesterfield, Wentzville, Lake St. Louis, Dardenne Prairie, Weldon Spring, Cottleville, St. Paul, Josephville, Weldon Spring Heights, Harvester, Flint Hill, and Kampville. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 208 and 229. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
